text: Events from the year 1740 in Russia ==Incumbents== * Monarch – Anna until * Monarch – Ivan VI of Russia after ==Events== * January - The Ice House was built in St. Petersburg. * * * * * ==Births== * * * - Ivan VI Antonovich of Russia, Emperor of Russia in 1740–41. (d. 1764) * - Ivan Lepyokhin, Russian naturalist, zoologist, botanist and explorer. (d. 1802) * * ==Deaths== * * * * Anna, monarch (born 1693) * ==References== 1740 in Russia Category:Years of the 18th century in the Russian Empire
title: 1740 in Russia
